update module
pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
module_name = #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
module_icon = #{moduleIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator_code = #{creatorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update module set pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, module_name = #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, module_icon = #{moduleIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator_code = #{creatorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_created = #{gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifier_code = #{modifierCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bak01 = #{bak01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak02 = #{bak02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak03 = #{bak03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak04 = #{bak04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak05 = #{bak05,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select m.* from module m where m.status = 1;

SELECT DISTINCT m.* FROM module m, USER u, role r, user_role ur, role_module rm WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} AND m.status = 1 AND ur.`user_id` = u.`user_id` AND ur.`role_id` = r.`id` AND rm.`role_id` = r.`id` AND rm.`module_id` = m.`id`;
SELECT m.module_name FROM module m WHERE m.module_name LIKE #{fuzzyText};
